extendedIngredients.name: semi sweet chocolate chips
extendedIngredients.originalString: Â¼ cup semi-sweet chocolate chips, melted

recipes.title: Samoa Rice Krispie Treats

winePairing.pairingText: Cream Sherry, Moscato d'Asti, and Port are great choices for Rice Crispy Treats. A common wine pairing rule is to make sure your wine is sweeter than your food. Delicate desserts go well with Moscato d'Asti, nutty desserts with cream sherry, and caramel or chocolate desserts pair well with port. You could try NV Solera Cream Sherry. Reviewers quite like it with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 17 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: NV Solera Cream Sherry
productMatches.description: The Solera Cream Sherry has a brilliant amber and deep copper hue. With butterscotch and pecan aromas, the sweet salted nut and brown spice aromas carry a complex caramel accent. A sweet entry leads to a rounded, lush, moderately full-bodied palate with a lengthy, flavorful finish.

recipes.instructions: Spray a 9 x 13 pan with non-stick sprayIn a large saucepan, melt the butter over low heat.Add the marshmallows and stir until melted.Stir in the Rice Krispies and the Samoas.Place the mixture into prepared pan and pat evenly in pan.Allow to cool.Place the melted chocolate into a zip lock bag, snip off the edge and pipe the melted chocolate onto the Rice Krispie treats.Place in the refrigerator for about 10 minutes for the chocolate to set and then cut.

steps.step: Spray a 9 x 13 pan with non-stick spray
In a large saucepan, melt the butter over low heat.
Add the marshmallows and stir until melted.Stir in the Rice Krispies and the Samoas.
Place the mixture into prepared pan and pat evenly in pan.Allow to cool.
Place the melted chocolate into a zip lock bag, snip off the edge and pipe the melted chocolate onto the Rice Krispie treats.
Place in the refrigerator for about 10 minutes for the chocolate to set and then cut.
